channel.title: 1960s on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in 1960s on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 1.13: Spring 'time', German and the 60´s
item.description: 31st March, 2011 After some rain last night, the air smells like monsoon in India; so fresh and clean! I´ve opened the window to let it come in and along with it are the chirps and tweets of the birds.

item.title: Arranged Marriage
item.description: Arranged marriage is an old concept. It existed long before people accepted love (that occurred before marriage) as a valid reason to marry. The process through which this changed is reflected very well in the movie ‘Fiddler on the Roof’.
